alert.backSessionDesc: Going back will terminate your session. Do you wish to proceed?
alert.clearCacheDesc: If you are experiencing issue, such as the app randomly crashing while initiating session, you can try clearing your cache.
alert.deleteDatasetDesc: All notes of the "{{name}}" list will be deleted. Do you wish to proceed?
alert.signOutDesc: Your session will be terminated. Do you wish to proceed?
alert.uploadFromUrlErrorDesc: Unable to fetch the image from the remote server. You may try again or choose another image.

edit.imageDesc: Choose an image that matches your idea:
edit.noImageFound: No image found based on your search query.
edit.removeImageDesc: Are you sure you wish to remove the image from this note?

settings.noColumnWarn: You must at least add a column to your notes.

error.badTokenDesc: The link used contain an invalid or expired token.
error.invalidCredentialsDesc: Please verify your login information and try again.
error.tokenExpiredDesc: Please retry by filling the forgot password form again.
error.unknownDesc: Something went wrong while communicating with the server.
error.userAlreadyExistDesc: Maybe you forgot that you already had an account?
error.userInactiveDesc: This account hasn't been activated yet. Do you wish to resend an activation link?

field.columnLanguageDesc: Choose this field carefully as it will set the synthetic voice language.
field.name: Name

notes.emptyDesc: You need list of notes to start a session.

permission.manualCameraActivationDesc: You have to grant camera access manually if you wish to use it in this application.

restricted.accountVerifiedSubtitle: You can now access your Polymind account.
restricted.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email address below and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
restricted.forgotPasswordSentSubtitle: Verify your mailbox for the steps to follow.
restricted.registerEmailSentSubtitle: Please check your mailbox for instructions
restricted.resetPasswordDoneSubtitle: You can now login using your new credentials
restricted.verifyEmailSentSubtitle: Check your mailbox for further instructions

session.chooseFields: Choose the fields you wish to use:
session.drawerSelectList: Which list do you want to practice?
session.emptyDesc: You can start new sessions below.
session.noDatasetDesc: To start sessions, you need at least one list of notes.
session.pronounceAnswerDesc: A synthetic voice will pronounce the answer for you.
session.pronounceQuestionDesc: A synthetic voice will pronounce the question for you.
session.question: Question:
session.rangeDesc: Ask questions per pack of {{range}} items.

types.autoAssertiveDesc: Notes are showed and pronounced automatically, but you are obliged to answer.
types.autoPassiveDesc: Notes are showed and pronounced automatically.

welcome.listenDesc: Then start a session and let Polymind's voice guide you through your learning process.
welcome.noteDesc: First, enter the questions and answers you want to remember.
welcome.rememberDesc: Finally, take advantage of the freedom of attention! Do the dishes, medidate or even go to the gym!
